title: Brown-Finnis' Euros semi-finals predictions
summary: Former England goalkeeper and BBC pundit Rachel Brown-Finnis gives her predictions for the two semi-final ties at the 2025 European Championship.

title: 'Kelly & Agyemang are this year's Russo & Toone'
summary: In 2022, Alessia Russo and Ella Toone were England's instrumental super subs. Fast forward to 2025 and there is a new double act keeping the Lionesses' title hopes alive.

title: 'Is this a movie?' - England overcome odds to reach final
summary: England have overcome all odds to reach the Euro 2025 - so how have they done it?
